item.title: Requirements definition-Article that can become a person who can design a system
item.description: ## Introduction Have you ever experienced programming while studying programming? ** “I can’t make a product even after studying” ** ** “How do you do development in the first place?” ** What is the requirement definition? In order to solve that problem, let’s first understand the overall feeling of development. See “Software development process” below The programming I’m always studying corresponds to the “implementation” part. In other words, there are as many as four walls before you can exercise your programming skills.
